thread.title: BRIEF-Nippon Steel President: Worried That One-Way U.S. Import Curb Would Have Big Impact On Global Steel Trade

title: BRIEF-Nippon Steel President: Worried That One-Way U.S. Import Curb Would Have Big Impact On Global Steel Trade

organizations.name: reuters) - nippon steel & sumitomo metal corp
big impact on global steel trade reuters

text: March 2, 2018 / 7:18 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Nippon Steel President: Worried That One-Way U.S. Import Curb Would Have Big Impact On Global Steel Trade Reuters Staff March 2 (Reuters) - Nippon Steel & Sumitomo Metal Corp President Kosei Shindo: * TRUMPâ€™S REMARKS ON U.S. IMPORT CURBS REGRETTABLE * WORRIED THAT ONE-WAY IMPORT CURB WOULD HAVE BIG IMPACT ON GLOBAL STEEL TRADE * CONCERNED THAT POSSIBLE SPREAD OF PROTECTIONISM TO OTHER COUNTRIES WOULD CAUSE STAGNATION AND CONFUSION IN GLOBAL TRADE * WORRIED THAT STEEL PRODUCTS SHUT OUT BY U.S. MAY HEAD TO ASIA AND LOWER STEEL PRICES Further company coverage: (Reporting by Yuka Obayashi)
